weka.dl4j.iterators.instance

Class ImageInstanceIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.AbstractInstanceIterator
      • weka.dl4j.iterators.instance.ImageInstanceIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, ConvolutionalIterator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResizeImageInstanceIterator

    public class ImageInstanceIterator
extends AbstractInstanceIterator
implements ConvolutionalIterator
    An iterator that loads images.
